CustomField.description: If "Visual Type" is "Combo" or "Image", the API name of the URL field on the hierarchy object that will contribute its value to displaying an image in the hierarchy tile avatar.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If "Visual Type" is "Combo" or "Image", the API name of the URL field on the hierarchy object that will contribute its value to displaying an image in the hierarchy tile avatar.
CustomField.label: Visual Field
